name: Up Periscope
summary_text: In 1942, Navy Lieutenant Kenneth Braden from the underwater demolition team is sent to a Japanese island to photograph secret radio codes.

name: My Favorite Wedding
summary_text: Tess is paired with the best man in her best friend's wedding to save it from disaster. But by the time the couple say "I do," Tess realizes that her own longtime boyfriend may not be the right guy for her "to have and to hold" after all.

name: Pichaikkaran
summary_text: A rich businessman chooses to lead the life of a homeless beggar for a period of 48 days in the hopes that he could cure his mother, who is on the brink of death.

name: The Blackout
summary_text: It's Christmas Eve, the city goes dark, and the few remaining tenants of The Ravenwood find themselves trapped in their building. And they are not alone.

name: The Last Sentinel
summary_text: No emotion. No fear. No pain. They were the perfect soldiers to protect mankind - until the drone police became the perfect enemy. Tallis, a cyber-enhanced soldier, rescues a rebel beauty and teach her to fight and think like a machine.

name: Harb Atalia
summary_text: A battle for a diamond necklace begins in Italy between the Italian mafia, a rich man and an Egyptian lawyer who his fiancée is kidnapped by the rich man.

name: Inherit the Wind
summary_text: Based on a real-life case in 1925, two great lawyers argue the case for and against a science teacher accused of the crime of teaching evolution.

name: The Policeman of the 16th Precinct
summary_text: Three poor friends, Ilias, Thomás and Vangelis, decide to commit a burglary, but everything, although being planned with detail, goes wrong.

name: The Revengers' Comedies
summary_text: Henry is about to jump off a bridge when he hears a cry for help. He helps Karen, who had also planned suicide. They're both on Tower Bridge, London, because somebody wronged them. Revenging each other gives them a reason to live.

name: White Line Fever
summary_text: In the 1970s Arizona, a young married man becomes an independent long-haul driver and he risks his life fighting the corruption in the local long-haul trucking industry.

name: The Shuttered Room
summary_text: A series of horrific murders is traced to a creature that inhabits a very strange house.

name: The Story of Robin Hood and His Merrie Men
summary_text: When King Richard the Lionheart leaves England to lead a crusade to the Holy Land, his treacherous brother conspires to bring himself to power.

name: Spitfire
summary_text: Aircraft designer/patriot R. J. Mitchell, alarmed at growing German militarism, works to perfect a defense against the German Messerschmidt at the cost of his health.

name: Beyond Tomorrow
summary_text: The ghosts of three elderly industrialists killed in an airplane crash return to Earth to help reunite a young couple they initially brought together.

name: Chris D'Elia: Man on Fire
summary_text: Actor and comic Chris D'Elia delivers a hilarious take down of life's greatest pitfalls in his Netflix Original comedy special "Chris D'Elia: Man on Fire."

name: Dukhless 2
summary_text: Max Andreev thought the best place to start a new life would be at the other end of the world. What he didn't know, is that you can't outrun your past.

name: Whitewash
summary_text: Thomas Haden Church stars in this darkly comic thriller about a snowplow driver who, after accidentally killing a man, attempts to escape the cops by fleeing into the harsh Canadian wilderness.

name: Drew Peterson: Untouchable
summary_text: Following the mysterious disappearance of his fourth wife, a man is accused of the murder of his third.

name: Aachi & Ssipak
summary_text: In a future where energy is made from fecal matter, the government rewards defecation with "juicybars". Small-time hustlers try to get rich while fending off the mutated Diaper Gang.

name: Getting Played
summary_text: Three beautiful women decide, on a bet, to select and seduce a total stranger.

name: Vinterviken
summary_text: John-John is young and black, growing up with his mother and stepfather in a boring suburb south of Stockholm. On one of the last days of the summer vacation, they rescue 10-year old ...                See full summary »

name: The Truce
summary_text: Based on Primo Levi's autobiographical "The Reawakening".

name: Roxie Hart
summary_text: Roxie Hart signs a murder confession in order to attract publicity for her dancing career as dames don't swing in Cook County. Will everything go as planned?

name: The Show Must Go On: The Queen + Adam Lambert Story
summary_text: A documentary on how Adam Lambert took over from the legendary Freddie Mercury as the frontman for the rock group Queen.

name: Be Range Arghavan
summary_text: An undercover Iranian intelligence officer investigates the political status of a college student, whose parents were active members of the mujahedin khalgh radical group.

name: The Lost Medallion: The Adventures of Billy Stone
summary_text: A man who stops into a foster home to drop off some donations soon tells the kids a story about two teenage friends who uncover a long-lost medallion that transports them back in time.

name: Shoot on Sight

name: The Tomb
summary_text: An engaged writer falls under the spell of a mysterious temptress who steals souls.

name: Tomie
summary_text: A traumatized young woman is trying to recover her memories with the help of a psychiatrist. During her hypnosis sessions, she repeats the name "Tomie" but is unable to recall where she knows it from.

name: The Education of Little Tree
summary_text: Little Tree is an 8-year-old Cherokee boy who loses his parents during The Great Depression and begins living with his Indian grandparents and learning the Cherokee way of life.

summary_text: Welcome to Atlantis, where royal guardsmen wear uniforms that could easily be from the wardrobe of Ming the Merciless and some unfortunate slaves are turned into bovine-headed beasts.

name: The Blue Bird
summary_text: Mytyl and her brother Tyltyl, a woodchopper's children, are led by the Fairy Berylune on a magical trip through the past, present, and future to locate the Blue Bird of Happiness.

summary_text: As the Trost District is reclaimed from the Titans, Eren is taken under the wing of Captain Levi and his squad, who decide to try and teach him to master his mysterious abilities.

summary_text: The story of a family and a love affair told through the journey of a young woman called Suzanne.

name: Bigfoot

name: Nishabd
summary_text: A man, who has been married for 27 years, falls in love with his 18-year-old daughter's friend.

name: Tian mai zhuan qi
summary_text: A sister and brother, the last heirs of a family of acrobats, are called upon by a Buddhist monk sect to retrieve an artifact that their ancestors have protected throughout the ages.

summary_text: On the stagecoach to Cheyenne, a mixed group of passengers must work together to survive the arduous journey and the Indian attacks.

summary_text: A teen must resort to extreme measures to protect her family from a supernatural entity.

summary_text: During the volatile 1987 Aegean crisis, a collector sets out to the memory-ridden coast of Asia Minor and unearths a haunting mystery dating back to the Great Fire of Smyrna. Can a blood sacrifice appease decades of pain and suffering?

name: Güle Güle

summary_text: When Annamaria, a longtime friend of Alessandro and Arturo, ask the couple to take care of her children, the relationship between the two men reaches a point of no return.

summary_text: A girl steals a weather machine from Santa Claus, to make a snow day. The machine breaks, and causes an out-of-control snowstorm.

summary_text: When a group of Burmese refugees join the congregation, the pastor of a failing Anglican church attempts to aid them by planting crops and enlisting the help of the community.

name: Carmina y amén.

summary_text: A drug-dealer goes cross country with a group of roadies to deliver or else he'll be killed by a group of gangsters.

summary_text: Internationally proclaimed comic genius Stephen Chow must change the lives of radiant prostitute Maggie Cheung Man-yuk, filthy beggar Anthony Wong, and a killer in this heavenly comedy directed by masterful new wave filmmaker Johnnie To.

summary_text: A teacher on a Greek island becomes involved in bizarre mind-games with the island's magus (magician) and a beautiful young woman.

summary_text: Jessica, a single parent, owner of a struggling diner, finds the inspiration she needed when her high school boyfriend, Chase, a professional baseball player returns to town.

summary_text: The three friends are back, and this time they have both a funeral and a wedding to worry about.

name: A Nanny for Christmas
summary_text: Ally's fired from an ad agency. She gets her BFF to arrange an interview with an ad exec mom. She gets the job - but as a nanny. Morgages and recession makes her take it - but what's she know about looking after kids?

summary_text: The true story of a Hawaiian princess' attempts to maintain the independence of the island against the threat of American colonization.

name: Sappho
summary_text: Sappho, a newly wed American wife, with her husband on the Greek island Lesbos, goes through the pain of unrequited love to a young woman, very much like the namesake poet in ancient times.

summary_text: A shift in the Earth's polarity plunges the equatorial regions of the planet into an ice age of -459 degrees Fahrenheit; a temperature so cold that energy and light doesn't exist.

name: The Last Witness

In the 13th month of the 13th year of a new millennium, humans battle a world of demons.
